name: Shoukan Connect
description:
Willy and his younger brother Stew have found themselves another summoning circle. Always prepared, they brought their anti-ghost tripwire!

Use your tripwire to prevent the ghosts from reaching the circle and connecting the 5 points of the star that has no affiliation to any existing religion!

Can they withstand the onslaught? Will new enemies appear at higher stages? Will the music get any less repetitive? Only way to find out that the answer to all of those questions and more is 'NO'! Press Play!

Controls:

Left Arrow Key - Rotate counter-clockwise

Right Arrow Key - Rotate clockwise

X Key - Flip 180 degrees

Made for the Ryan Laley Games Spring Jam

Theme: Connections

Made using Pico-8

All assets made solely by me.
